LanguageData.LightningRod.label: powered lightning rod
LanguageData.LightningRod.description:
A lightning rod with an ion beam emitter for map-wide protection from lightning strikes.
Requires power, but discharges power for a short while after it gets hit. Can get overwhelmed.
LanguageData.LightningRodBasic.label: lightning rod
LanguageData.LightningRodBasic.description:
A basic lightning rod for map-wide protection from lightning strikes.
Does not produce power and will need repairs after extended use.
